item.description:
It's summer and a great time to be on the water. Come bring your boats or rent one from Edgewater Canoe and kayak. We will be paddling the Merrimack river from there and up to Memorial field for lunch. Then we can paddle around a bit more or just head back. It's about 2 -3 hours total. Edgewater rents both single and double up kayaks. Bring the young ones if you want. Also a small packed lunch, sunscreen and water.

If your brand new I will give you an easy paddle lesson and make sure your doing ok.

The rental cost is only $5/ hr. If you bring your own boat , it's a $5 charge to park. ( it helps pay for the porta  potty too) So see April when you arrive to give her your name then come find a boat and say hello to me.I will let Rob know how many so no need to call to reserve. See you then.

My number 603-315-0275

Edgewater 603 540-5620

 

RAIN will cancel this meetup.
item.how_to_find_us: meet me at the boat ramp
item.name: Easy kayaking
